company.name: VeeRoute
company.description: is British tech company that produces electrical vehicles

review.description: Guys, are awesome as fuck, I was really enjoyed working with them!
review.author: Michail Boldov

task.description: Certainly, the main core of logistics is optimization algorithms which had been developed by guys from the algorithm team. But UI also has its own challenges to fit the needs of postal services.
features: Allows dispatcher to plan routes across the country, find bottlenecks and fix it
Allows manager to configure routes in a flexible way
